basic.description: Reading courses on topics not covered in other available courses, arranged with individual members of the Department.  RELS 502/3.0 may be taken independently or as a continuation of RELS 501/3.0.
basic.subject: RELS
basic.title: Directed Special Studies II

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite     Level 4 and registration in a RELS MAJ Plan and permission of the Department.
